items.title: Presented at MLSE Workshop in Hakone
items.summary: Presented 'Automating Multi-view Requirements Engineering with Collaborative LLM Agents'.
items.content: A valuable opportunity to discuss preliminary findings with researchers in software engineering and machine learning.

items.title: Attended IEEE VIC Summit and Honors Ceremony
items.summary: Connected with researchers and innovators at the IEEE VIC Summit in Tokyo.
items.content: Great discussions and potential collaborations across innovation and impact-oriented projects.

items.title: Presented at WIREDS 2024
items.summary: Presented SLR work on GenAI in Requirements Engineering and received a distinguished presentation award.
items.content: Presented at the First International Workshop on Intertwining Research & Education on Software (WIREDS) in Osaka.

items.title: Participated in Rakuten Technology Conference
items.summary: Joined talks and panels featuring AI and cloud computing experts.
items.content: Participated in technical sessions with practitioners and leaders in Tokyo.

items.title: Participated in FATTW 2024
items.summary: Discussed practical LLM applications in software testing technologies.
items.content: Engaged with experts and researchers at Future Advanced Testing Technology Workshop in Makuhari.

items.title: Selected for Doctoral Scholarship
items.summary: Selected for Scholarship for Fostering Researchers in Doctoral Programs.
items.content: Awarded by Waseda University scholarship program.

items.title: Joined QAML as Part-time ML Engineer
items.content: Working as a part-time machine learning engineer.

items.title: Served as IEEE HKN Co-Chair
items.summary: Served as Co-Chair of IEEE Eta Kappa Nu Waseda Mu Tau Chapter.
items.content: Contributed to chapter activities and student initiatives.

items.title: Joined Reliable Software Engineering Lab
items.summary: Joined the Reliable Software Engineering Laboratory at Waseda as a Ph.D candidate.
items.content: Started doctoral research under Prof. Hironori Washizaki.

items.title: Passed Entrance Exam at Waseda
items.summary: Passed Ph.D. entrance examination at Waseda University.

items.title: Presented at APSIPA 2023
items.summary: Presented work at APSIPA in Taipei.
items.content: Presented deep-fake speech detection research at APSIPA ASC 2023.

items.title: Graduated from JAIST
items.content: Completed M.S. program and graduated from JAIST.
